mapper.sql: RECORD_FLOW, VISIT_FLOW, MODULE_CODE, MODULE_NAME, PROJ_FLOW, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW

select
distinct
from PDSCI.EDC_VISIT_MODULE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.EDC_VISIT_MODULE (RECORD_FLOW, VISIT_FLOW, MODULE_CODE, MODULE_NAME, PROJ_FLOW, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{recordFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
